CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 2, 1955, pg. 11, reads: "LAST RECITAL OF SEASON - When the Marie Carter Hayes School of Music closes for the summer, the last recital to be held at the school, 6490 Frankstown Avenue, will present Carolyn J. McClellon, pianist, and Marva M. Josie, vocalist. The event, outstanding in musical world of Pittsburgh, will take place July 3, at 5 o'clock.  The school reopens in September."
TitMainTitle: Pianist Carolyn J. McClellon seated at piano, and vocalist Marva M. Josie standing beside her, in Hayes School of Music
